short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopping cart for LSA course guide

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Chrome extension that allows users to wishlist classes into a virtual "Shopping Cart" from the University of Michigan's LSA Course Guide. Includes a calendar view from the selected classes.
